lines: Life itself is a privilege. But to live life to the fullest- well, that is a choice.
author: <Author:0x00007f724765e260>

lines: Your circumstance doesn’t make life extraordinary. Love does.
author: <Author:0x0000555606895718>

lines: And still, after all this time, the Sun has never said to the Earth,‘You owe me.’ Look what happens with love like that. It lights up the sky.
author: <Author:0x000055560754aeb8>

lines: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: <Author:0x0000555607926de8>

lines: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: <Author:0x0000555607aa7ac8>

lines: Let us see what love can do.
author: <Author:0x0000555608397c00>

lines: Believing that the dots will connect down the road will give you the confidence to follow your heart.
author: <Author:0x00005556093834e8>

lines: As is our confidence, so is our capacity.
author: <Author:0x00005556093fc5a0>

lines: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you pales in comparison to what lies inside you.
author: <Author:0x00005556094c2a20>

lines: Live from the heart of yourself. Seek to be whole, not perfect.
author: <Author:0x0000555609554560>

lines: Personality begins where comparison leaves off. Be unique. Be memorable. Be confident. Be proud.
author: <Author:0x000055560959dbe8>

lines: Bravery shows up in everyday life when people have the courage to live their truth, their vision and their dreams.
author: <Author:0x000055560963e250>

lines: Only when we're brave enough to explore the darkness will we discover the infinite power of our light.
author: <Author:0x00005556096fb3a0>

lines: Bravery is the audacity to be unhindered by failures, and to walk with freedom, strength, and hope, in the face of things unknown.
author: <Author:0x0000555609838970>

lines: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
author: <Author:0x00005556098dc278>

lines: There is always light, if only we're brave enough to see it. If only we're brave enough to be it.
author: <Author:0x0000555609a8d928>

lines: Give me six hours to chop down a tree, and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
author: <Author:0x0000555609b726b8>

lines: First, I prepare. Then I have faith.
author: <Author:0x0000555609c11830>

lines: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.
author: <Author:0x0000555609c27018>

lines: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant.
author: <Author:0x0000555609d0c280>

lines: It's not the will to win that matters-everyone has that. It's the will to prepare to win that matters.
author: <Author:0x0000555609d8bd28>

lines: You can easily judge the character of others by how they treat those who can do nothing for them.
author: <Author:0x0000555609dfe0f8>

lines: The greatest discovery of our generation is that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind. As you think, so shall you be.
author: <Author:0x0000555609e52220>

lines: What we know matters but who we are matters more.
author: <Author:0x0000555609e44198>

lines: The truth of your character is expressed through the choice of your actions.
author: <Author:0x0000555609ef68e8>

lines: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
author: <Author:0x0000555609f681f0>

lines: When we create peace and harmony and balance in our minds, we will find it in our lives.
author: <Author:0x000055560a0315f0>

lines: Do your little bit of good where you are; its those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
author: <Author:0x000055560a0aa450>

lines: When we have peace in our hearts and minds, we draw peace into our lives.
author: <Author:0x000055560a09c940>

lines: It isn’t enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn’t enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
author: <Author:0x000055560a0f7f98>

lines: Peace. It does not mean to be in a place where there is no noise, trouble or hard work. It means to be in the midst of those things and still be calm in your heart.
author: <Author:0x000055560a10df50>

lines: When you stay on purpose and refuse to be discouraged by fear, you align with the infinite self, in which all possibilities exist.
author: <Author:0x000055560a127d88>
